name: BomberWhale
description:
BomberWhale is an online multiplayer platformer game complete with fully networked bombs and players, where you play as a whale cursed with absorbing the nearest bomb that rolls to you. Absorbing bombs is both your best friend and worst enemy. It's your first and foremost weapon -- spit out bombs at other players to cause them to absorb them! But if a bomb blows up in your mouth, it'll hurt a lot more than a cavity. Yeet bombs at your friends to blow them out of this hot potato battle royale!

Created by Alston Chan, Jamie Ip, Trevina Tan, and Jonas Ong for Bear Jams Fall 2020

How To Play with Friends:

1. Get friends

2. One person creates a room by entering their name and preferred room code (this will be the host)

3. All other players join by entering their own names and the same room code

4. Once the host clicks "Begin the Game", the game will start for everyone.

5. Simply refresh the page to play again.

Controls:

WASD to move

-- W to jump, press W twice for a double-jump

Click and hold to charge up your absorbed bomb and throw it in the direction of your cursor.

Tips and Tricks:

- Bombs start glowing red when they're about to explode. Either run away or use the opportunity to bomb someone!

- A player will only die if a bomb explodes inside them. You want to time things so that you throw the bombs close enough to be absorbed, with as little time on the bomb timer as possible.

- Hold your mouse button to charge up the bomb; the longer it's charged, the further it'll fly.

- Bombs can collide with each other too; if you see a bomb coming your way, divert its path by throwing another bomb at it.
